title: Attiuk
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indians of North America - Canada - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Canada
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Hunting and gathering societies
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cultural relativism
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture - Social aspects
description: To understand the life of the Montagnais, you have to walk twelve days on snowshoes as far as Lake Musquaro in search of the caribou, following a dream contained within the skins of the drum that the elders patiently craft, like a canoe. The hunters hunt the caribou, which provide the skins for their drums which give them their dreams, which brings them the caribou.
